rationale: The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
Plain statement about cases, no moderate verb + scale.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports the location of latest human cases, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
Reports location/group of cases, not capability or preparedness.
The segment reports case location/group, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
The segment reports the location of latest cases, not speculation about future relief or improvement.
Authorial statement provides factual reporting of case location/type.
Factual reporting of case location/group without explicit framing cues.
